definitions.explanation_en: A masculine given name of English origin, often used as a proper noun to refer to a specific individual.
definitions.explanation_cn: 一个源自英语的男性名字，通常作为专有名词用于指代特定的个人。
definitions.example_en: Darrell Johnson is the lead architect on the new city hall project.
definitions.example_cn: 达雷尔·约翰逊是新市政厅项目的主要建筑师。
